overview: Nothing hits like a teenage love affair. The shiny newness, and pure passion of it all is absolutely intoxicating. One can loose their head in the best of ways and end of driving all night just for a few minutes of that magic in the sheets for instance, giving generous gifts, or even going undercover as a secret admirer to hopefully progress out of the friend-zone! The beautiful boys in this raunchy romance suffer that sweet agony and more in this quest for lust-laced love. Join these beautiful teenage friends, boyfriends, and secret admirers, as they adorably fumble towards ecstasy, with raging hormones, having the best sex of their lives along the way.
title: Teenage Lovers
